summary: This document is an email exchange between Vahe Stepanian and Amanda Kirby discussing a wire transfer related to Hyperion Air. The conversation indicates a delay in the posting of the wire transfer to a checking account, with mention of contacts who can provide further information.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda is involved in a discussion regarding a wire transfer and is coordinating with Vahe Stepanian.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe is discussing the status of a wire transfer and providing contact information for follow-up.

persons.name: Janet
persons.context: Janet is mentioned as someone who has sent wires to the account before and is surprised by the delay.

persons.name: Gina
persons.context: Gina is mentioned as a backup contact in case Janet is unavailable due to a storm.

connections.description: Vahe and Amanda are communicating about a financial matter related to Hyperion Air.
Vahe refers to Janet as someone who has experience with wire transfers to the account in question.
Gina is mentioned as a potential contact if Janet is unavailable.

keyFacts: The email discusses a wire transfer that has not yet been posted to a checking account.
Vahe Stepanian is associated with Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.
Amanda Kirby is coordinating with Vahe regarding the wire transfer issue.
Janet has previously sent wires to the account and is surprised by the delay.
Gina is mentioned as a backup contact for further inquiries.
